footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). This brew, used for centuries by indigenous communities, is a powerful tool for deep healing and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The combination of these plants allows DMT, a powerful visionary molecule present in Chacruna, to be active when ingested, producing profound visions and a state of expanded consciousness. This allows us to access deep parts of our subconscious, releasing emotional blockages, healing traumas, and receiving clarity about our life's purpose.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, heals, and guides. It is not a recreational substance but a sacred medicine that must be approached with respect, intention, and under the care of experienced guides.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Ayahuasca helps you see your life from a new perspective, providing clarity on your path and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of repressed emotions, healing deep traumas and emotional wounds.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands your consciousness and connects you with the universe, offering a sense of unity and belonging.
groupCeremonyDescription: We share the experience in a group, creating a space of collective support and healing. It is a powerful way to connect with others on the same path of self-knowledge and transformation.
privateCeremonyDescription: We offer private sessions for those seeking a more intimate and personalized process. A space dedicated exclusively to you, allowing for deeper and more focused work.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your healing journey with love, respect, and deep wisdom.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this guide.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must provide an image URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The guide will be permanently deleted.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet prepares your body to receive the medicine with respect and clarity. We recommend starting at least 3-5 days before the ceremony.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass of your journey. A calm mind and open heart are key.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and cultivate inner silence.
reflectionDescription: Take time to be with yourself, write in a journal, and connect with your inner world.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. It's a process of purification. Trust, surrender, and allow yourself to feel. Our team will be there to support you with love and without judgment at all times.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound experience.
preparationProcessDescription: Physical, mental, and spiritual cleansing to open your channels.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space for introspection and connection with the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: The journey inward, where visions and emotions reveal deep truths.
integrationProcessDescription: Bringing the teachings of the ceremony into your daily life for lasting change.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its sacred origin, and its power to heal and transform.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced hearts who will accompany you with wisdom and respect on your inner journey.
preparationCtaDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. Find out how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for this sacred experience.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to be part of our community and stay updated on our upcoming events and ceremonies.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your journey.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back to your spiritual path.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community and start your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: Welcome! We're glad to have you.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access exclusive content, book ceremonies, and connect with our community. It only takes a minute!
tourWelcomeDescription: Before we begin a brief tour, could you provide us with your phone number? This will help us stay in touch about your interests.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will only use it to contact you about ceremonies.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and videos from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our upcoming ceremonies. You can see details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: Now, we invite you to fill out a brief confidential questionnaire. This helps us get to know you better and ensure a safe and profound experience for everyone.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Adjust your application's colors. Enter HSL values (e.g., '210 40% 96.1%').
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, traveler of consciousness. I am here to guide you on your path of healing and self-discovery. How may I assist your spirit today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again later.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations between users and the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used by our team to ensure a safe and appropriate experience for you.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or others)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please specify the medications and dosages.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or explore...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessDescription: Thank you for taking this important step. We invite you to review our preparation guide to get the most out of your experience.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete our confidential health questionnaire to prepare for your ceremony at El Arte de Sanar. Your well-being is our priority. You can fill it out here:
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Write your message here... (HTML is supported)
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of this ceremony.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in past events.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted for this user yet.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled. Check back soon!
editHeroVideoDescription: Change the main video on the homepage by uploading a new file or providing a URL.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore the history of our active, past, and archived events.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This ceremony will be hidden from the main lists but will remain in the 'All Ceremonies' history. Are you sure?
